body: Prerequisite: Shadow resistance racial trait; Benefit: Attacks made against members of this race while they are within areas of dim light have a 50% miss chance instead of the normal 20% miss chance. This trait does not grant total concealment; it just increases the miss chance. This is a supernatural ability.
name: Shadow Blending
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Defense Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Shadow Blending
